Key Arguments: The proposed law excludes the government from its own regulations, which is seen as unfair.
The law limits freedom of speech for all Australians except the government.
The decision-making process for what constitutes misinformation or disinformation is undemocratic and resembles authoritarian practices.
Notable Quotes: The decision re what actually constitutes misinformation or disinformation, planned to be determined by a selected group of individuals, is the mechanism straight out of Communist China.
